name: Angelic Virtues
description:
Oh cardinal virtue of Justice, grant me an unwavering heart, that I may never hesitate to do what I know is right.

Oh cardinal virtue of Prudence, grant me an unflinching heart, that it may become a shield to protect others.

Oh cardinal virtue of Temperance, grant me a merciful heart, that my love may reach all, unclouded by bitterness.

Oh cardinal virtue of Fortitude, grant me a courageous heart, that I may  have the strength to be reborn as my true self.
